summary: A society lady engineers a marriage between her lover and a cabaret dancer who is essentially a prostitute.
cast: Paul Bernard|María Casares|Elina Labourdette|Lucienne Bogaert|Jean Marchat|Yvette Etiévant|Marcel Rouzé|Bernard Lajarrige|Lucy Lancy|Nicole Regnault|Emma Lyonel|Marguerite de Morlaye|Blanchette Brunoy|Gilles Quéant
keywords: tap dancing|female jealousy|possessive female|possessive mother|manipulative female
title: Las damas del bosque de Bolonia
